mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no as empNo , e.emp_nm as empNm , e.dept_cd as deptCd , e.emp_pos_cd as empPosCd , c.cm_nm as empPosNm FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN cmcd c ON e.emp_pos_cd = c.cm_cd WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT e.emp_no as empNo , e.emp_nm_en as empNm , e.dept_cd as deptCd , e.emp_pos_cd as empPosCd , c.cm_nm_en as empPosNm FROM emp e LEFT OUTER JOIN cmcd c ON e.emp_pos_cd = c.cm_cd WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
SELECT d.dept_cd as deptCd , d.dept_nm as deptNm FROM dept d ORDER BY d.dept_cd ASC
